text: Events from the year 2002 in Sweden ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Carl XVI Gustaf * Prime Minister – Göran Persson ==Events== * January 21: Honor killing of Fadime Şahindal ==Deaths== Astrid Lindgren. * 28 January - Astrid Lindgren, children's writer (born 1907). * 29 April - Sune Andersson, footballer (born 1921). * 6 November - Folke Frölén, horse rider (born 1908). ==See also== * 2002 in Swedish television ==References== Category:Years of the 21st century in Sweden Category:2000s in Sweden Sweden Sweden
title: 2002 in Sweden
